Celebrity woes: Is Harshvardhan Kapoor being stalked by a female fan? 
Harshvardhan Kapoor has a female fan, who apparently, has been incessantly following the actor. bollywood Updated: Feb 18, 2017 07:24 IST Hindustan Times Harshvardhan Kapoor is reportedly being stalked by a female fan. (HT Photo) 
Actors often have interesting stories about their admirers and encounters with crazy fans. And apparently, actor Harshvardhan Kapoor has a creepy story too — HT Café has learnt that the actor is being chased incessantly around the city by a female fan. 
The source says, “Harshvardhan has a huge female fan following. However, the actor is lately being stalked by one of his diehard female fans. The fan has apparently been following the actor for the past few days. She has been attending almost every event he is part of, and has turned up outside his gym on several occasions as well.” Read more Salman vs Arijit to Harshvardhan vs Diljit: Bollywood fights don’t last forever 
The source added that the woman has been chasing Harshvardhan whenever he steps out of his house. “She knows his address and has been waiting outside his house to catch a glimpse of Harshvardhan. Moreover, she has been talking to his security guard and making enquiries about the actor.” A post shared by Harshvardhan Kapoor (@harshvardhankapoor) on Feb 7, 2017 at 10:41am PST 
The source says that the fan keeps asking the guard about the actor, and has also requested him to share Harshvardhan’s personal mobile number. The woman has also told the guard that she would like to marry the actor, the source says. However, the source reveals that the actor has not taken any measures to keep the fan away from him yet. 
Harshvardhan was not available for a comment. 
The actor, who was last seen in Mirzya that co-starred Saiyami Kher, will next be seen in Bhavesh Joshi, which is helmed by Vikramaditya Motwane. tags
